scripts.g:clean: bash -c 'if [ -e "$INIT_CWD/package.json" ] && [ $INIT_CWD != $PROJECT_CWD ]; then cd $INIT_CWD && rm -rf bin; else echo "\"clean\" must be executed in a package root, not in $INIT_CWD"; fi'
scripts.g:build: bash -c 'if [ -e "$INIT_CWD/tsconfig.json" ] && [ $INIT_CWD != $PROJECT_CWD ]; then cd $INIT_CWD && tsc; else echo "\"build\" must be executed in a package root with a tsconfig.json file, not in $INIT_CWD"; fi'
scripts.g:test: bash -c 'if [ -e "$INIT_CWD/package.json" ]; then cd $INIT_CWD && yarn build && cd $PROJECT_CWD && jest $INIT_CWD; else echo "\"test\" must be executed in a package root, not in $INIT_CWD"; fi'
